articles.title: Champions League Final Is Moving to Porto, Portugal - The New York Times
articles.description: Istanbul is in lockdown and England wouldn’t bend on coronavirus travel restrictions, so European soccer’s governing body will take its showcase game to Porto, Portugal.

articles.title: Amazon Wins Case Against EU Regulators Over Luxembourg Taxes - NPR
articles.description: The European Commission has said the online giant got a sweetheart deal from Luxembourg that amounted to "illegal state aid" worth $303 million.
articles.content:
